Name: Bad Santa
About the game: Bad Santa is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about the girl Florance, who broke up with her boyfriend. She hasn't had sex in a very long time. And for Christmas she asked Santa to come and fuck her! Her wish came true! In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the history of a girl who has not been fucked for a long time. After breaking up with a guy, no one fucked her for a long time. She really wanted sex and asked Santa to come and fuck her. Her wish came true and Santa himself arrived. What happened next you will see in this game ... Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!
